summary.overview: Creates and initializes the CARDDEMO database for credit card transaction processing. Establishes database structure with transaction type tables, loads reference data for 7 transaction types and 19 subcategories, and configures security permissions for the card demo system.
business_functions: Database Cleanup - Releases existing DB2 application plans and packages to prepare for fresh database setup
Database Creation - Creates CARDDEMO database with proper tablespaces and storage configuration
Table Structure Setup - Creates TRANSACTION_TYPE and TRANSACTION_TYPE_CATEGORY tables with referential integrity constraints
Security Configuration - Grants comprehensive database access permissions to application users
Transaction Type Loading - Populates master transaction types (Purchase, Payment, Credit, Authorization, Refund, Reversal, Adjustment)
Category Data Loading - Loads detailed transaction subcategories covering various payment scenarios and transaction methods

CREADB21.jcl.program_overview: TSO command processor that executes DB2 administrative commands and SQL operations
System utility that serves as a conditional checkpoint in job processing flow

datasource_summary.name: DB2 System Load Modules Library (OEM.DB2.DAZ1.SDSNLOAD)
datasource_summary.function: Contains DB2 system load modules required for database operations and job execution

datasource_summary.name: Language Environment Runtime Library (CEE.SCEERUN)
datasource_summary.function: Contains Language Environment runtime modules needed for program execution

datasource_summary.name: DB2 Exit Routines Library (OEM.DB2.DAZ1.SDSNEXIT)
datasource_summary.function: Contains DB2 exit routines for customized database processing

datasource_summary.name: DB2 Version-Specific Load Modules (OEMA.DB2.VERSIONA.SDSNLOAD)
datasource_summary.function: Contains DB2 version-specific load modules for database compatibility

datasource_summary.name: DB2 Runtime Load Library (OEM.DB2.DAZ1.RUNLIB.LOAD)
datasource_summary.function: Contains DB2 runtime load modules required for database program execution

datasource_summary.name: Transaction Type Reference Table (CARDDEMO.TRANSACTION_TYPE)
datasource_summary.function: Stores master reference data for transaction type codes and descriptions including purchase, payment, credit, authorization, refund, reversal, and adjustment types

datasource_summary.name: Transaction Type Category Detail Table (CARDDEMO.TRANSACTION_TYPE_CATEGORY)
datasource_summary.function: Stores detailed transaction type categories with subcodes and descriptions, linked to the main transaction type table for comprehensive transaction classification

datasource_summary.name: DB2 System Dummy Table (SYSIBM.SYSDUMMY1)
datasource_summary.function: System table used to generate constant values and perform SQL operations that don't require actual data tables
